links.*: The Lord of the Rings (1955 radio series)

wikitext.*:
'''Bernard Rebel''' ([[6 October|October 6]], [[1901]] - [[30 September|September 30]], [[1964]]) is an English actor of Polish heritage. He provided the voice of [[Gríma|Wormtongue]] in the 1955-56 radio series ''[[The Lord of the Rings (1955 radio series)|The Lord of the Rings]]''.
